title: Bedcover, 18th century
description: White bedcover with white embroidery in heavy raised stitches and knots. Large floral pattern similar to English seventeenth century designs and showing East Indian influence. Corner, side and center designs – details not matching. Designs flow together to cover surface.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bedcover, 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered. 1948-97-1.
